replaceComponents(ISyntacticStructure, List<Long>) - Method in interface grammarModel.structure.ISyntacticStructure

resetIndexes() - Method in interface grammarModel.genericTools.IChains
Reset indexes in order to re-initialize navigation.
resetIndexes() - Method in class grammarModel.genericTools.impl.Chains
 
resetIndexes() - Method in class grammarModel.genericTools.impl.PosetMaxChains
 
resetIndexes() - Method in interface grammarModel.genericTools.IPosetMaxChains
In order to reinitialize the navigation and generate the implications associated with the semilattice, reset IChains specific indexes (pointing the antecedent of an implication) and IPosetMaxChains index (pointing the consequent).
